body:
Comment 3: 
From what I can discover, 0xea000037 is a branch forward 0x37 + 8 + PC on overflow. I've
played around with runtime._sfloat2 and stepflt but I'm really out of my depth. From
what I can tell this issue has probably been present in the codebase, certainly as early
as the weekly.2010-12-22, for some time.
